Scriptal.Name: Update GMP
Scriptal.Description: Adds or removes GMP from the player. A negative number will subtract GMP.
Scriptal.EventFunctionTemplate: TppTerminal.UpdateGMP( { gmp = |[1|NUMBER]| } ) if |[2|STRING]| ~= "" then if |[1|NUMBER]| > 0 then InfCore.DebugPrint(|[2|STRING]| .. " [GMP +" .. |[1|NUMBER]| .. "]") else InfCore.DebugPrint(|[2|STRING]| .. " [GMP " .. |[1|NUMBER]| .. "]") end end

Choice.Name: GMP Value
Choice.Description: The amount of GMP to be granted to the player. Set to a negative number to subtract GMP. The mimimum amount of transactionable GMP is 10.

Choice.Name: Notification Message
Choice.Description: Displays a notification to announce that GMP has been added or removed. Automatically appends [GMP <GMP Value>] to the end, to match the appearance of GMP notifications in the base game. Leave empty to add/remove GMP without a notification.
